TopicTitle: So Who Else Browses This Forum While Waiting For KSP To Reload After A Crash?

Articles.Content:
I do it all the time... Play KSP and it crashes... Set it to reload again and while waiting for it to grind through all the database loads I jump on here for snorts and giggles.

I do believe KSP is the FIRST game where I don't mind the bugs so much. Of course they can get irritating at times but I deal with them a lot better than most.

So who else is here because their KSP crashed again lol. (most of it is my fault for loading all those unnecessary TOTALLY necessary mods)
No, I don't do anything while the game is loading because alt-tab during the loading messes the text up for me, and Steam's web browser is slow for me.
